name: Jorge Cajas Mota
title: Software Engineer
bio: Software engineer at MangoChango, S.A., Winner of Oracle Duke Choice 2016 with Guate JUG. Active member of Guate Jug.Part of the organizing committee of Java Day Guatemala.Java / Android / Web Developer.Speaker at multiple events inside and outside Guatemala during the last 8 years.Experience implementing e-banking solutions and enterprise applications in AWS / Digital Ocean environments using Java technologies.
